mapper.select: SELECT userid, loginid, username, startdate FROM user

SELECT userid, loginid, username, passwd, targetamount, monthlife, daylife, startdate, livexpdepositid, (select depositname from deposit where depositid = livexpdepositid) as livexpdepositname FROM user WHERE loginid = #{loginid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userid, loginid, username, passwd, targetamount, monthlife, daylife, startdate) VALUES (#{userid}, #{loginid}, #{username}, #{passwd}, #{targetamount}, #{monthlife}, #{daylife}, now())
